mapper.select: select storecode,name,latitude,longitude,address,brand,distance from ( select storecode, name,latitude,longitude,address,brand,CALC_DISTANCE( #{lat},#{lon},LATITUDE,LONGITUDE) as distance from cvstore order by distance ) where rownum <= #{cvStoreCnt}

select p.name, p.imgurl, p.price, cvs.storecode, cvs.brand, cvs.name as storeName from cvstore cvs join cvstoreproduct cvsp on cvs.no = cvsp.cvstore_no join productlist p on cvsp.productlist_no = p.no where cvs.storecode = #{storecode}

select p.name as name, p.no as productcode, p.price as price, c.no as no, c.warehousingdate as warehousingdate, c.expirationdate as expirationdate, ROUND((c.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) as countTime from cvstoreproduct c join productlist p on c.productlist_no = p.no join cvstore cvs on c.cvstore_no = cvs.no where cvs.storecode = #{storecode} and c.enrollment = 1
and ROUND((c.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) > 0
select c.no, c.name, c.storecode, c.address, c.brand from cvstore c WHERE c.storecode = #{storecode}
